name: CARE Middle School - Bayview
description: Provides Middle School Students (Grades 6-8) who have been either truant or expelled additional support to help them return to school and get them back on track.
fullDescription: Provides Middle School Students (Grades 6-8) who have been either truant or expelled additional support to help them return to school and get them back on track.
whatTheyOffer: Provides Middle School Students (Grades 6-8) who have been either truant or expelled additional support to help them return to school and get them back on track.
howToGetIt: For more information contact: (415) 969-1976. To apply, YMCA and SFUSD staff will lead internal discussions in addition to an exploratory conversation with the student and parent and before providing an individualized plan of action that supports the student's educational needs.
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Bayview Hunters Point
